intro.dialogue: I can see some buildings up ahead. They don't seem to be the ones that are around here in the normal world though. Regardless, I might find a way back.
Hell, if that weird bird is right, I might even get to bang some chicks!
(authors note: No chicks are going to be banged)
The closer I get to the city, the sketchier it looks.
This doesn't seem too good of a neighborhood, I have to watch my back or else I might get into trouble.
I can't afford to be mugged right now. I need this money to pay for rent, food the electricity bill!
Ah, who am I kidding? I live at home with my parents.
Honestly, I do not feel safe here. This place has such a bad vibe to it. It feels like I could be kidnapped any seco-
Wow dude let go off me!
This is a robbery! Give me your money, phone and wallet. MEOW! I don't have all day!
Wha, what's happening??
You're being robbed, you idiot. You give me your stuff? No one gets hurt. Got it?
Robbed? By you? I'm not being robbed. You're way too adorable to rob anyone, young lady.
Young lady? YOUNG LADY! YOU THINK I'M A YOUNG LADY!
Well, you don't exactly look 57 now, do you?
That's not the part I'm talking about you moron! Can't you see I'm clearly a man!
Now now, there is no need to get angry young lady.
STOP CALLING ME A YOUNG LADY.
Well, I don't quite have your name now, do I?
You're being robbed. Why would I tell you my name?
What are you gonna ask for next? My bank account details? Social security number? Marital status?
Well now that you mention it, I do wanna know why a cutie like you is roaming the streets robbing people without a partner in crime.
Wha, what are you even talking about?
Quick, he's distracted I can get out from under his claws
Where do you think you're going! Don't you dare meowve!
I'll let you rob me if you tell me your name, middle-aged lady!
Middle-aged? I'm 21! AND STOP CALLING ME A LADY. I AM NOT A LADY. I AM 120 POUNDS OF PURE MALE MASCULINE MEOWSCLE!
You know what? Fine. My name's Elliot. Can you stop calling me a young lady now?
See, I knew a cutie like you would have a fitting name.
You seem quite hurt. How'd you end up here?
I don't wanna talk about it.
Why? What's wrong?
I said I don't wanna talk about it.
Well, are you gonna be fine if I just leave you here?
Don't you dare move a finger! You still haven't given me your money!
Damn, not even asking me out for a drink first. You seem like quite the golddigger Elliot
Are you expecting your robber to pay for your drinks? In what fantasy world do you live?
I could ask you the same. But how about this? I take you out for a date to get some food and you don't rob me of everything I have? Does that sound like a good deal to you?
Are you seriously asking your robber out on a date right meow?
Well, do you have anything better to do?
As long as you're paying for my food and drinks. I have nothing to lose I guess.
Great! It's a date then!
Hmmmm. Fine.

options.dialogue: Test my emotions through w or s

angry.dialogue: what the fuck! you fucking dick!
